definitions.example: The wool on my arm produced a strange feeling.
The house gave me a feeling of dread.

definitions.definition: (always in the plural) Emotional state or well-being.
definitions.example: You really hurt my feelings when you said that.

definitions.definition: (always in the plural) Emotional attraction or desire.
definitions.example: Many people still have feelings for their first love.
He has no feeling for what he can say to somebody in such a fragile emotional condition.
